Model.BugReport.PerformanceMetrics

Class ProblemSolving

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.BugReport.PerformanceMetrics.PerformanceMetrics
      • Model.BugReport.PerformanceMetrics.ProblemSolving

  • public class ProblemSolving
extends PerformanceMetrics
    Class extending the performance metrics class, representing a problem solving metric. A developer's problem solving skill is measured by: The number of Closed bug reports the developer is assigned to The number of unfinished (i.e. New, Assigned or Under Review) bug reports the developer is assigned to The average lines of code for each submitted patch The total number of patches submitted
